title: Park Plaza 605 (1953) colorized (Tom Conway, Eva Bartok)

sources.title: Park Plaza 605 (1953) colorized (Tom Conway, Eva Bartok)
sources.description: After accientally intercepting a secret message about a meeting in room 605 of the Park Plaza hotel, a private detective (Tom Conway) escapes with his life but is framed for a murder. He proceeds to uncover a jewel-smuggling scheme involving a sexy woman (Eva Bartok) and a fugitive Nazi war criminal. Tom Conway as Norman Conquest Eva Bartok as Nadina Rodin Joy Shelton as Pixie Everard Sidney James as Supt. Williams Richard Wattis as Theodore Feather Carl Jaffe as Boris Roff Frederick Schiller as Ivan Burgin Robert Adair as Baron Von Henschel Anton Diffring as Gregor If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
